item.title: Designing learning environments for CS1 debugging
item.description: This project explores the challenges university students face while learning to debug code. The goal of this work is to design digital tools that support students during the programming process.

item.title: Uncovering pain points and opportunities for a sales team dashboard
item.description: This project was part of my UX Research internship at Pampered Chef. In this project, I synthesized qualitative and quantitative data to inform the design of a new dashboard to help leaders manage their team’s sales.

item.title: Analyzing how interface design shapes children's collaborative play
item.description: In this project, the research team and I explored how interface modality impacts the way children interact with one another during play. We compared two interface designs: a touchscreen interface and a tangible interface controlled by physical blocks.

item.title: Co-designing an interactive exhibit with middle schoolers
item.description: In this project, I worked alongside community partners and youth to re-design an interactive tabletop exhibit at the Adler Planetarium. The goal of this work was to empower middle school students to design an exhibit that resonated with them.

item.title: Evaluating visitor experiences in a computing museum exhibit
item.description: This project was part of my curatorial internship at Living Computers: Museum + Labs. I conducted a visitor survey as well as interviews with museum staff to better understand exhibit engagement patterns.

item.title: Designing an interactive museum label
item.description: This project was part of my undergraduate thesis in Computer Science and Art History. I worked with a team of my peers to design and develop an interactive museum label.
